info.title: E-Commerce API
info.description: RESTful API for E-Commerce application with authentication and product management

400.description: Product out of stock or insufficient stock

get.summary: Get a specific category with its products

selected_item_ids.description: Optional: Array of cart item IDs to checkout. If not provided, all cart items will be checked out.

400.description: Cart is empty or insufficient stock

get.summary: Get all products with optional filters
Get a specific product by ID

delete.summary: Remove product from wishlist by product ID

get.summary: Check if product is in wishlist
